column4: PacBio Iso-seq data from L. sclopetarius WGS
column5: Adult female spider collected from Skarholmen in Uppsala, Sweden, with the purpose of whole genome sequencing using PacBio Isoseq sequencing.
column10: L. sclopetarius adult female spiders were collected in the wild in a small habitat in Uppsala, Sweden, and were then kept in big containers that allowed them to spin webs.
